listitem.para: Sets the flood color to color, which can either be a color index or a color vector. A color index is a number from 0 - 15. A color vector is a list of [red green blue] intensities, each in the range of 0 - 255. For an explanation of the color input, see the section on Using Color.
The flood color affects the FILL and BITBLOCK commands.

programlisting.userinput: CLEARSCREEN REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] RIGHT 45 PENUP FORWARD 20 SETFLOODCOLOR [0 255 0] FILL
